desc: Industrial Cleaning Equipment Suppliers | Pressure Washers, Floor Sweepers, Scrubber Driers, Heavy Duty Cleaning Machines North East, Teesside & Durham

layout.text: The perfect heavy duty industrial floor scrubbing machine. Available in twin or single brush configuration the TOMCAT SPORT packs a punch, with powerful motors & class leading 5 levels of electronic brush pressure. If you want a quality floor cleaning machine make TOMCAT your choice!
